item.title: CHWY
item.description: score:-25 Chances: Pet care stocks are incredibly effective in diversifying investment portfolios, leveraging the robust growth of the pet care industry. Chewy stock (NYSE:CHWY) has experienced an endless plunge over the past two years, which may make the stock a prime M&A target.
